Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

If and when the restart/sequel occurs 
should there be a second yahoo group 
just for OOC talk/arguements? 

  o Hell yes, if I see dewboy/LN in another bitch fest I'll scream! 
  o Heck no, I love watching the mud fly! 
  o Undecided, Not gonna vote cause it'll just start another bitchfest. 
  o Other, Stop making damn polls Jon! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
